casebody.data:
Jermaine HARRIS, Personal Representative of the Estate of Annie Ruth Flie, Plaintiff-Appellant,
v.
OAKWOOD HEALTHCARE, INC., d/b/a Oakwood Hospital & Medical Center, Anand Hiremath, M.D., Luningning V. Regalado, M.D., Normita Vicencio, M.D., PC, William I. Michels, III, D.O., and Dearborn Family Clinic, PC, Defendants,
and
Joseph C. Finch, D.O., and Joseph C. Finch, D.O., PC, Defendants-Appellees. SC: 157092
COA: 333389 Supreme Court of Michigan. November 16, 2018

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of the Michigan Association for Justice to file a brief amicus curiae in support of the motion for reconsideration and the application for leave to appeal is GRANTED. The amicus brief submitted on November 7, 2018, is accepted for filing.
